scripts.dev: node -e "if (process.versions.node.split('.')[0] < 20) { console.error('\x1b[31mRequires Node.js version 20\x1b[0m'); process.exit(1); }" && vite
scripts.build: node -e "if (process.versions.node.split('.')[0] < 20) { console.error('\x1b[31mRequires Node.js version 20\x1b[0m'); process.exit(1); }" && tsc -b && vite build
scripts.preview: node -e "if (process.versions.node.split('.')[0] < 20) { console.error('\x1b[31mRequires Node.js version 20\x1b[0m'); process.exit(1); }" && vite preview
